reviews.review: Yayınlandığı ilk haftadan Eylül 2016 tarihine kadar aktif olarak yaklaşık 1100 saat oynamışımdır. Son 6 yılda belirli zaman dilimlerinde nostalji adı altında girerek 44 saat anca ilave edebildim, her şey ortada başıboş DLC çıkarmaktan başka hiçbir şey yapmamışlar...
Каеф
ИГРА ТОПЧИК НАХУЙ

Do tej pory jakoś dało się znosić ilość błędów w tej grze, ale każdy ma swoje granice. Mimo wszystko zacznijmy od pozytywów: Potrafi wciągnąć jak mało co, duży wybór postaci oraz umiejętności, sporo zróżnicowanych map i (prawie) idealna do gry ze znajomymi. A teraz przejdźmy do minusów:
- Balans leży i kwiczy, większość postaci potrzebuje nerfa albo buffa
- Hitboxy są za duże
- W rzeczywistości da się grać tylko samemu lub z pełną drużyną znajomych, we 2 osoby od czasu do czasu nie dołącza do meczu i daje errory, w 3 osoby nie da się grać: nie dołącza do sesji prawie w ogóle, a jak dołączy to zawsze kogoś wyrzuca w trakcie rozgrywki
- Mimo, że nie mogę za to winić devów to muszę o tym wspomnieć: coraz częściej ludzie wychodzą z meczów lub zabójca/ocalali afczą przez cały mecz
- Im wyższa ranga tym więcej cheaterów
- Po tylu latach nadal nikt nie wpadł na pomysł, żeby dodać rozgrywki nierankingowe
Podsumowanie:
To co się dzieje dosłownie boli, bo nie całe 3 lata temu ta gra była genialna, mocna 9/10, ale mimo sporej ilości nowości jakie dostajemy, pojawiają się również spore błędy, które nie są naprawiane i jak to już wspomniałem gra wciąga, więc zaczynam trochę czuć się jak masochista. Robi nam się powoli takie drugie GTA 5, ale jak nie ma zbytnio dobrych nowych gier, to się gra w co się ma. Moja ocena to 3/10.

The game is fun, no question. If you play by yourself, the game is great. If you have ever tried to queue up for a game with 2 or 3 friends then you will understand why I don't recommend this. I bought this with the intention of playing this with my friends, afterall, this has a co-op tag.

A few patches ago there was not even an option to queue up with your friends unless you had a full party of 5. But now the option to queue with friends exists. Unfortunately, I spend on average 10-15minutes trying to find a game when there are 3 of us together. With just 2 people it usually takes about 5 minutes, but by yourself it takes <1 minute.

If you have ever complained about League of Legends dynamic queue times with your friends, then this queuing will drive you bonkers. If they added random skill checks while searhing for games with your friends that might make the game more engaging. Or they could add a perk to make friend queuing actually work, then I could change this review to recommend.

Game still buggy as all hell but still a ton of fun. Main complaints are matchmaking bugs and drops from the game, not just me but also teammates which ruins everyones experience because they can't get as much points. Otherwise the game is original and tons of fun to play, especially with friends.

UPDATE 12/31/16: I've got to hand it to the devs - they've worked really hard to fix this game. And I think they've succeeded.

Watching Youtube videos, it was clear that a lot of the bugs had been fixed, so I decided to download this again and give it another shot. The bug situation is well within acceptable range now. It's still a toss-up who you get matched with: depending on your perks and their perks, each match could be a walk in the park or a frustrating slog. More impressive, however, are the stuff the devs have done to fix jerkwad behaviour, including:

- Hiding player levels until the end of the match. No more exiting matchmaking! This does wonders for new players.
- Some anti-cheat measures, such as disconnecting players who are connected to Discord. It's not a perfect system, mind you, but it's a bit harder.
- Flagging players who are doing crap.
- Players who disconnect mid-game get docked a "pip" (kind of like experience points for ranking).

All in all, I am very impressed by the devs continued efforts to improve this game. I still think it was released too early (perhaps to claim a userbase before Friday the 13th), but it's also clear that the game is not merely a quick cash grab. I would now recommend this game, though be prepared to lose a lot early on.

ORIGINAL

Even though I've played this game 30 hours, I don't like it. The idea is very neat, but the execution is terrible. Today I finally decided to cut my losses and uninstall.  Here are the reasons why:

- Bugs. They are still there. Granted, there are fewer. Nonetheless, when you're in a ranked match and your game freezes up on you,  you really feel cheated. Plus, the lobby is pretty much always broken. You have to press "join game" a whole bunch of times.
- Matchmaking. There appears to be very little in the way of balance. Top tier players with top tier perks are pitted against the bottom tier. Perks are a huge difference. Be prepared to lose a lot before you get enough perks to compare. Or...
- Play like a jerk. This isn't just being "selfish" as the game intends. There are a number of ways to game this game in order to get lots of points, usually at the expense of others. For example, as a survivor you can disconnect at any time without penalty. As a killer you can refresh lobbies until you get bottom tier players, much to the chagrin of the other players. Plus, there are far too many ways for people to waste your time. A killer might wait as you bleed out on the floor, or a survivor might wait by the exit until you watch them win.

In short, don't play this game. Wait for Friday the 13th.

Dead by Daylight es un juego que no me esperaba que fuera así para nada, en el lado positivo.

Por fuera, en vídeos y demás lo ves como "no esta mal, pero no será tan complicado", pero cuando entras y juegas tu mismo al juego, te mete en una tensión sin quererlo ni beberlo que al menos para mi, es adictiva, nunca había tenido tanta tensión en un juego, ni en los de terror típicos, que ya una vez te los conoces, no hay tensión ninguna, pero aquí como cada asesino es un mundo, no sabes con lo que te puedes topar.

En ese sentido, es un buen juego en mi opinión pero como todos los juegos, tiene sus contras:

-El smartmatching es bastante pésimo, a que me refiero, a que tarda mucho (o poco si tienes suerte) en encontrar partida, y encima se va cancelando por lo que tienes que volver a darle a buscar, en vez de darle una vez, y que siga buscando hasta que encuentre una partida, sinceramente espero que arreglen eso pronto.

-Bugs en el mapa, en algunas zonas, el personaje no se puede ni mover, por que se queda atrancado con el suelo y con alguna roca y no se puede levantar para correr, y en un momento en el que te a visto el asesino y te pasa eso sabes que estas muerto.

-Laggs, se que esto no tiene que ver nada con el juego sino con los asesinos, pero debería de haber alguna manera de regular eso, por que como te toque un asesino que vive en la otra punta del mapa y es él el que hostea la partida, ya te puedes preparar para ir saltando de lado a lado, por que te teleportas por el mapa y es imposible jugar, asi que espero que ideen alguna manera de lidiar con ese problema, aunque sea por zonas o no se, pero a veces es imposible jugar.

Y por el resto a excepción de estos ultimos 3 puntos por lo restante me parece un juego muy recomendable, espero que introduzcan más supervivientes y más asesinos, y corrijan los fallos, existentes, espero que sirva esto de ayuda y guía a los que vayan a comprarlo y espero que lo disfruten como lo disfruto yo, pasadlo bien <3

I made a review about this in 2016 back in the early days of the game and it has come a long way from what it used to be. The matchmaking no longer takes ages to find players. A lot of bugs have been fixed. Overall, the experience is a hell of a lot smoother than in 2016.

When first purchasing this game after watching multiple streamers play it, my decision became quickly clear that I had to play this game myself. With being a big Call Of Duty fan I knew there was another game out there that could keep my interest. This game did. Slowly I've let Call Of Duty go and turned all my free time into this game. (not much but it's my free time). I've loved learning new ways to play this game and get better. Even with some of the updates I still couldn't get enough. Bravo. Now to why I made up my mind to write a review. The tweeks that have been updating to my game some good and other not so much. I have noticed alot of fixes to help out the killer. While all is fine I find it quite irritating to be able to level up my killer quicker and easier than my surviver. With that I would love to see a fix so the killer won't stalk us on the hook and have a second chance at surviving. I do love where this game is going, but please don't forget the survivers.

 Thanks for your ears.

Enjoyable, Fun, and overall an excellent experience especially with a group of friends. Some balancing required but nothing too broken. A few bugs but again nothing too horrid. Worth the set price without a sale. 7/10.

Dead by Daylight is almost everything that Damned promised to be but never was. For cheaper price and with much better graphics that is. Really good multiíplayer survival horror, 4v1 concept that actually works most of the times (unlike Damned when it mostly didnt) 

It is a perk based game so you need to spend some hours loosing before you level up and have a fighting chance. There are also online ranks but so far the matchmaking is non existant and completely random. 

There is also quite a few bugs in the game at this moment (09/08/2016) but the game is still very new and devs seem to care about the game and keep patching it and adding new game modes, so there is that. The lobby system is also kind of broken at this time but devs are promising to fix it.

This game certainly isnt perfect and has it flaws but is still enjoyable to play with interesting gameplay, so in its current state I rate it 7.5/10 - only time will tell if I will make this score higher or lower eventually.

Good game i guess. Should be early access but oh well...

Essentially a mediocre game that has maintained relevance through the love of horror fans and people who appreciate intellectual property. The game is very killer heavy and licensed killers get more love and attention than their base killers because of how they are loving the DLC throat stuffing rather than making a more mechanically involved game. To me the game is very monotonous and may have something to do with how it has a good reception as it is fairly accessible and can be understood by a larger demographic within a circle of friends. 

Why is this a problem you ask? Well, if you add in 20+ licensed characters into a game that is as mechanically in depth as a children's sandbox, you run into a mechanical ceiling very quickly that doesn't offer much breathing room for different killers or even survivors to flourish with a unique sense of placement. You're essentially playing a very similar mechanic and paying for the likeness of a killer to feel nostalgic and increase cognitive ease.  So when this happens, the game is essentially a Hook, off of hook, juke, run, and camp fest that can trick people into thinking the game is toxic or makes the game feel more tedious than it needs to be compared to say, "Friday the 13th" game. Which has it's own seperate problems from Dead by Daylight but objectively has a more reasonable reason to exist. 

In conclusion, this game has essentially watered itself down into a "parachute game" where the most fun you might get is playing with close friends.

мне игра понравилась, да в начале было много багов и именно из-за них такая статистика обзоров(то есть плохих больше). Может многие могут сказать, что игра скучная по сюжету и делать в каждой катке приходится одно и тоже, но вспомните CS:GO, ведь там тоже самое, то есть делать каждую катку и каждый раунд одно и тоже, но всё же в эту игру играют и при чём очень много. Так же и с этой игрой, тут всё зависит по обстоятельству, никто не знает в какой ситуации вы окажетесь в то или иное время, так что это и делает эту игру захватывающей. Моё мнение эта игра заслуживает своих денег!
페이데이 재밌게했던분들이라면 재밌게하실듯 다만 단점이 있다면 아직 핵쟁이들을 많이 못잡는다는것과 각종 버그들이 너무 많고 살인자 패턴이 너무 단순하여 고랭대에서 좀더 심도 깊은 플레이가 힘들다는 점 살인자가 발전기를 고장낼수 있게 하는 룰이 변경되어야한다고 봄

Thrilling and challenging. It's very easy to get yourself caught if you're trying to do things too quickly, so take it easy folks. Wait for a moment that you know you are truly safe or truly screwed to break into a sprint. 

Very few bugs in this game as far as actual gameplay but the menu can get a bit freaky sometimes. 

You can play with friends now! So that's pretty awesome

All around a good game to get your heart pumping, with only light-medium rage induced from gameplay.
ахуенно
这款游戏感觉很刺激，很好玩的说
Щикарная игра. Можно играть с друзьями!
每次組隊都排隊等30多分鐘才會排到一局,然後打了一局不到5分鐘就結束,還他媽的是被外掛跟改數據屠夫幹死.匹配系統之爛就不說了,滿天飛的外掛和BUG真的讓遊戲體驗非常糟糕.
Fockin AMAZING!

和 朋友一起逃生是件很有乐趣的事，然而这垃圾匹配什么鬼？？
1.匹配 用的服务器是屠夫 的，屠夫村里网所有人 遭殃 
2.游戏一局10分钟，匹配5分钟
游戏内容虽然好玩，但是服务器机器非常不稳定一旦到了高峰不是卡就是进不去房间，让人十分恶心，在提升服务器质量前并不提倡中国玩家购买！

从公测到现在，我已经看到过这个游戏的无数BUG。
1.跨过木栏的时候卡在木栏上。
2.走过山脚卡在山脚。
3.二层房子一楼门口的发电机修时直接卡到地底。屠夫也拔不出来。
4.进游戏直接卡到五维空间（游戏之外），黑暗能看到很多灯光。隔着木板能看到地下室
5.屠夫直接被人类压板子后踩到地底（？？？）
6.人类被献祭后去救人时人疯狂旋转。
其实还有很多大小bug，但是说这么多，必须夸的是游戏趣味性很高。并不是很容易让人腻味。还有一点，关于匹配，不知道是什么问题，匹配确实有点难，基本一局都要等上一段时间才能满人。还有这个游戏的外挂确实多，基本名字黑格子的都是挂，屠夫挂也不少，不懂这样玩游戏有意思吗?总得来说还是值得购买的，这个价格不算高。
gute

PC özellikleri fazlasıyla bu oyuna yetiyor fakat low ayarlarda bile 50 fps alamıyorum.high ve ultra da zaten 25 fps filan onun dışında gayet beğendim oyunu tavsiyem fps sorunu çözülene kadar bu daha tamamlanmamış oyuna bulaşmayın.
Güncelleme:evet artık oyun da bulamıyoruz.

Güncelleme:Hazır yeni DLC gelmişken yazayım dedim.artık oyunu oynamak istiyorsanız 40 dk lobide beklemeniz gerekiyor.

Güncelleme:Sizin yapacağınız oyunu *****.Ulan ne güzel konsepti var oyunun fikir gayet güzel ona rağmen gidip oyunu bok edebiliyorsunuz.Millet steam forumlarında fps sorunu diye çıldırıyor.Siz hala DLC getirin.Çok potansiyeli olan bir oyun ama siz gidip bugları düzeltmiyorsunuz,optimizasyonuz düzeltmiyorsunuz millet 20 fps sürünüyor.Böyle devam oyun çok tutar eminim.

Güncelleme:Evet bu galiba son güncelleme çünkü artık oyunu oynayamıyorum.Fps veya oyuncular yüzünden değil bu sefer harbi oynamıyorum kicked from server error code 1 mi ne lobiye katıldığımda beni direk atan bir şey.internete yazın millet forumlarda çıldırmış durumda gerçi bu kasım ayında olan bir şeydi.Gene bi bakıyım dedim.Durum hala aynı.Artık oyuna sövemiyorum bile varsa çözümü bilen bunun altına yazarsa veya mesaj filan atarsa çok sevinirim.Gitgide buglar,hatalar artıyor.Almadan önce incelemelere bakan kişi bunu okuyorsa almasın gerek oyuncuları,hataları,bugları,leş bir optimitasyon sağolsun 20 fpslerde çürütmesi,hataları düzeltmek yerine çatur çutur dlc getirip para pompalaması ve dahasını ben yaşadım.Çoğu oyuncu yaşıyor,sizin de yaşamanıza gerek yok.Oyunun düzelmesini filan da bekleyin demicem çünkü öyle bir şey olmayacak.Sizin için en iyisi diğer oyunlara bakmak olacaktır.

Наиграв в DBD практически 30 часов, я спокойно могу сказать, что это одна из лучших игр в своем роде, в ней есть все, что нужно для таких атмосферных игр. 
Многие люди часто пишут, что им надоела музыка в меню игры, что они хотят, чтобы разрабы сменили ее или же добавили что то новое, в какой-то степени люди которые пишут так - правы, но все же я когда захожу в игру, могу слушать по пол часа эту музыку, а самое главное какой контраст, переключаюсь за выжившего, у вас идет более мягкая мелодия, в главном меню идет что-то среднее между выжившим и маньяком, а вот у маньяка идет я б так сказал "грубая" музыка, и не знаю как вам, но я готов слушать эту музыку, этот контраст между выжившим и маньяком часами.
Люди которые не играли в DBD сыграйте, не пожалейте денег, все таки в последнее время так мало годных игр стали выпускать.

Мне понравилось игра очень крутая по сетки с игроками вот только жалко сюжета нету а так мне все усраивает буду ждать маньека Джейсона Вурхиса самы крутой маньяк и кожаную маску с бинзопелой играйте только в лучшее.
